# layerCount

**Instance Property**

The number of layers in the rate map.

## Declaration

```swift
var layerCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is dynamically determined based on how many layers you’ve added to the descriptor. To add a new layer, call [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor/setLayer(_:at:)] or use the subscripting operator to assign a layer.

## Configuring the rate map layers

- **layer(at:)**: Returns the layer description for a layer in the rate map.
- **setLayer(_:at:)**: Sets a configuration for a layer rate map.
- **layers**: The rasterization rates for one or more layers in the rate map.
- **MTLRasterizationRateLayerArray**: Descriptions for the rasterization rates to apply to the set of layers in a rate map.
